#summary VBA Sync Information for published movies on TASVideos.org

The following applies only to GB/SGB/GBC movies:

These movies require VBA rerecording v20:

  * [http://tasvideos.org/1008M.html Akumajou Special - Boku Dracula-kun (Kid Dracula)]
  * [http://tasvideos.org/1065M.html Castlevania Legends]
  * [http://tasvideos.org/1639M.html Pokémon Green]
  * [http://tasvideos.org/1050M.html Wizards & Warriors X - Fortress of Fear]

These movies require VBA rerecording v17:

  * [http://tasvideos.org/564M.html Pokémon Gold]

All movies whose submission pages had a stated version earlier than v17 work on the latest version.
